snippet: After accusations of conflict of interest, Chief Justice Iftikhar Muhammad Chaudhry said he would leave the panel looking into corruption allegations against his son.
lead_paragraph: After accusations of conflict of interest, Chief Justice Iftikhar Muhammad Chaudhry said he would leave the panel looking into corruption allegations against his son.

headline.seo: Pakistan’s Chief Justice Removes Himself From Panel Investigating His Son
headline.main: Pakistan’s Chief Justice Removes Himself From Panel Investigating His Son
headline.print_headline: Pakistan’s Chief Justice Removes Himself From Panel Investigating His Son
